languages.text: "Это правда. В душе ее я больше не зрю смятения... Второй ткач, принять я готов твой отчет. Ты исполнила задание, что было тебе поручено самим Неумирающим?"
"This is true. No longer do I see anguish in her soul... Second Spinner, I am ready to receive your report. Have you accomplished the task the Undying One Himself set you?"
languages.original_text: "Это правда. В душе ее я больше не зрю смятения... Второй ткач, принять я готов твой отчет. Ты исполнила задание, что было тебе поручено самим Неумирающим?"

traits.locale_text: "That is true. No longer do I see anguish in her soul... Second Weaver, I am ready to receive your report. Have you accomplished the task the Undying One Himself set before you?"
"That is true. No longer do I see anguish in her soul... Second Weaver, I am ready to receive your report. Have you accomplished the task the Undying One Himself set before you?"
"This is true. No longer do I see anguish in her soul... Second Spinner, I am ready to receive your report. Have you accomplished the task the Undying One Himself set you?"
"This is true. No longer do I see anguish in her soul... Second Spinner, I am ready to receive your report. Have you accomplished the task the Undying One Himself set you?"
"This is true. No longer do I see anguish in her soul... Second Spinner, I am ready to receive your report. Have you accomplished the task the Undying One Himself set you?"
"This is true. No longer do I see anguish in her soul... Second Spinner, I am ready to receive your report. Have you accomplished the task the Undying One Himself set you?"

languages.text: « C'est vrai. Je ne perçois plus l'angoisse qui étreignait autrefois son âme... Je suis prêt à entendre votre rapport, deuxième tisseuse. Avez-vous accompli la tâche que l'Immortel vous a confiée ? »
languages.original_text: "This is true. No longer do I see anguish in her soul... Second Spinner, I am ready to receive your report. Have you accomplished the task the Undying One Himself set you?"

traits.locale_text: « C'est vrai. Je ne perçois plus l'angoisse qui étreignait autrefois son âme... Je suis prêt à entendre votre rapport, deuxième tisseuse. Avez-vous accompli la tâche que l'Immortel vous a confiée ? »

languages.text: «Cierto. Ya no veo angustia en tu alma... Segunda Tejedora, infórmame. ¿Has cumplido con la misión que te encomendó el mismísimo Inmortal?».
languages.original_text: "This is true. No longer do I see anguish in her soul... Second Spinner, I am ready to receive your report. Have you accomplished the task the Undying One Himself set you?"

traits.locale_text: «Cierto. Ya no veo angustia en tu alma... Segunda Tejedora, infórmame. ¿Has cumplido con la misión que te encomendó el mismísimo Inmortal?».

languages.text: 「確かに。もはや彼女の魂に苦悩は見えない…第二の織り手よ、報告を聞こう。不死の者がお前に課した任務は果たせたか？」
languages.original_text: "This is true. No longer do I see anguish in her soul... Second Spinner, I am ready to receive your report. Have you accomplished the task the Undying One Himself set you?"

traits.locale_text: 「確かに。もはや彼女の魂に苦悩は見えない…第二の織り手よ、報告を聞こう。不死の者がお前に課した任務は果たせたか？」

languages.text: “确实如此，我已经看不到她灵魂中的痛苦了……次席织网者，我已经准备好听取你的报告了。你是否已经完成了不死之神亲手交给你的任务？”
languages.original_text: "This is true. No longer do I see anguish in her soul... Second Spinner, I am ready to receive your report. Have you accomplished the task the Undying One Himself set you?"

traits.locale_text: “确实如此，我已经看不到她灵魂中的痛苦了……次席织网者，我已经准备好听取你的报告了。你是否已经完成了不死之神亲手交给你的任务？”

languages.text: "Das ist wahr. Ich sehe keine Pein mehr in ihrer Seele ... Zweite Weberin, ich bin bereit, Euren Bericht zu hören. Habt Ihr die Aufgabe vollendet, die der Todlose selbst Euch aufgetragen hat?"
languages.original_text: "This is true. No longer do I see anguish in her soul... Second Spinner, I am ready to receive your report. Have you accomplished the task the Undying One Himself set you?"

traits.locale_text: "Das ist wahr. Ich sehe keine Pein mehr in ihrer Seele ... Zweite Weberin, ich bin bereit, Euren Bericht zu hören. Habt Ihr die Aufgabe vollendet, die der Todlose selbst Euch aufgetragen hat?"

languages.text: "Doğru. Ruhunda artık ızdırap görmüyorum... İkinci Dokur, raporunu dinlemeye hazırım. Ölmeyen'in seni bizzat gönderdiği görevi tamamladın mı?"
languages.original_text: "This is true. No longer do I see anguish in her soul... Second Spinner, I am ready to receive your report. Have you accomplished the task the Undying One Himself set you?"
